user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.<COMPLETION_START>Being overweight is linked to various health problems.

Climate change is caused by human activity.
Most people will never achieve their childhood dreams.
Success is often a result of hard work and luck.
Multitasking decreases productivity.
The majority of people lie at least once a day.
Religion is not necessary for morality.
People with higher levels of education tend to earn more money.
The majority of people do not enjoy their jobs.
Capitalism has lifted more people out of poverty than any other economic system.
Most people will experience some form of mental illness in their lifetime.
The world population is growing at an unsustainable rate.
The death penalty does not effectively deter crime.
